about_the_game:
"Russia is big, but we have no way out. Behind us is Moscow. " ——Klochkov tyev

Hold your ground and fight to the end

Last blood is a pixel style 2D horizontal shooting game, which contains elements of survival, terror and exploration. Players will play a desperate but firm defender in various historical battles, survive the crazy attack of the enemy, and ensure that the position is always under the control of our army.

Exquisite pixel style

The game uses 2D pixel style, but this does not mean that the picture will look cartoon or unreal. We always pay attention to maintaining a dark and real style in the drawing of scenes and characters. You can clearly observe the blood spilled by the enemy when he dies, the light of the real physical state, the cartridge case dropped during shooting, and many such details

A real battle

It should be noted, friends, these historical battles are not fictional. In real history, you will find corresponding prototype characters. The difficulties and dangers they face are far more suffocating and desperate than those in the game. If you were them, could you still hold this position?

Game features

■In single player mode, players can command AI to help you fight together. In multi player online mode, we have included it in the development schedule. At that time, each map will accommodate 2-8 players
■They have different active skills. Releasing skills at the right time can get twice the result with half the effort.
■In the battle, we can explore the map, find the lost radio station, and complete the test task in the radio station to obtain random passive skills, which will make the experience of each game very different
■Hundreds of guns and special weapons based on real history, including rocket launchers, flame throwers and heavy machine guns, use all means to destroy the enemy!
■With special level design, players will find new ways to play in different maps, such as operating a grenade launcher or driving a tank
■Maps with interesting mechanisms and great differences in playing methods, fought bloody street battles with German troops in Stalingrad in 1941, or competed with American troops for tunnels and highlands in Korean mountains in 1952; Massive follow-up maps will be updated efficiently

short_description: Last Blood is a pixel-style 2D horizontal shooting game. The story takes place on the eastern front of World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War, with elements of survival and horror. Take up weapons, strengthen defenses, fight evil invaders, collect survival materials and make items;
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, Japanese
